name: A pair of massive voidplate boots
data: It increases the users strength phenomenally.
It increases the users dexterity adequately.
It increases the users constitution phenomenally.
It decreases the users wisdom adequately.
It decreases the users intelligence adequately.
It decreases the users charisma pathetically.
It has nice armour class for its type (low in general).
It increases the users hitpoint regeneration immensely.
This item loses its magical powers with average speed.
It increases the users asphyxiation resistance superbly.
The wearer becomes more attuned to the elemental forces.
